ResourceHeader.ResourceName: EISCAT CP1 Kiruna Remote Site ACF's (auto-correlation functions)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP1 auto-correlation functions (ACF) from the Kiruna remote site.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Line Of Sight Velocity
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity (for monostatic radar) or velocity along the Transmit/Receive direction bisector

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Line Of Sight Velocity Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Doppler Frequency Measured
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Doppler Frequency Measured

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter  Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Electron Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Electron Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  Ion Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Ion Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  Ion Temperature Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Primary Parameter Ion Temperature Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter Molecular Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter  O+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna  H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter  H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter H+ Ion Concentration relative to Ne - Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Kiruna Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 ACF Kiruna Additional Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Ion-Neutral Collision Frequency
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled value
